price: Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Emu na mobεtena (wͻ monkwa nna mu) na emu na mobɛwuo na emu na mobɛpue afire (wͻ Wusͻreε Da no).
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
